headline: Analysts Bullish on Lam Research Corporation (LRCX) as Semiconductor Capex and Memory Investments Rise
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Investments During A Recession. The fourth stock on our list of best investments is Lam Research Corporation. TheFly reported on January 9 that Goldman Sachs analyst James Schneider raised the LRCX price target to $180 from $160 while maintaining a Buy rating. Improved semiconductor industry circumstances, […]
